ExperienceSummary.Description: ~~~~~~~~~   is experienced in:  Marketing (Marketing Communications); and Sales.    ~~~~~~~~~   has 8 years of work experience.
ExperienceSummary.ManagementStory:
Starting on 8/1/2010, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 12 months:
	Title: Account Executive for UNT Newspaper

Positions.Description:
❖   Design on-brand marketing materials for sales promotions, tradeshows, and webinars.
❖   Code and design email campaigns via Campaign Monitor and Salesforce.
❖   Asset Management
❖   Source and design promotional items and giveaways.
❖   Provide marketing and design insight.

❖   Maintain and update Magento 2 eCommerce website, and social media.
❖   Design engaging graphics to be used in advertising and product images.
❖   Plan and create marketing emails, mailers, and other materials to promote the business.
❖   Fulfill online orders through Counterpoint and help achieve business and sales goals.
❖   Provide aid to customers with questions about products and online orders.

Analyze information obtained from AS/400 software and translate that information into
Excel spreadsheets.
❖ Audit data and determine solutions to resolve the errors and discrepancies.
❖ Call adjusters and salvage yards to assess the status and disposition of lots.
❖ Review damage to different types of vehicles and assess their current value.
   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  
   ~~~~~~~~~  , Coppell, Texas 75019

❖   Investigate property damage claims filed against the client and determine liability.
❖   Guide claimants on repairs or reimbursement of their property.
❖   Negotiate settlements with claimants and other insurance carriers.
❖   Monitor claimants for potentially fraudulent activity.

❖   Sold advertising space for the North Texas Daily to local and national clients.
❖   Monitored client satisfaction and ensured advertising needs were met.
❖   Assisted in designing ads for clients.
❖   Helped update and promote the Newspaper in order to keep its relevancy to the University.

QualificationsSummary:
❖   eCommerce	❖   Design and Creative Education
❖   Graphic Design	❖   Advertising
❖   Website Design	❖   Customer Service
❖   Marketing	❖   Data Analyst
❖   Social Media	❖   Data Entry

❖   Strong Organizational Skills	❖   Proficient on both Mac and Windows

Every position in a resume should have an employer name.
Every degree in a resume should have a name or type associated with it, such as 'B.S.' or 'M.S.'.
